DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare efficacy safety Metvix® natural daylight photodynamic therapy Metvix® conventional photodynamic therapy Aktilite™ lamp subject mild actinic keratoses ( intra-individual comparison ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intra-individual Comparison Efficacy Safety Metvix® Natural Daylight Photodynamic Therapy Versus Conventional Metvix® Photodynamic Therapy Subject With Mild Actinic Keratoses
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female 18 year ; 2 . Subject clinical diagnosis mild AK face scalp without clinical diagnosis moderate AK target area ( TAs ) ; 1 . Subject clinical diagnosis least one severe AK TAs 2 . Subject clinical diagnosis skin disease ( include nonmelanoma skin cancer ) TAs ; 3 . Subject pigment AK TAs
